Joseph Michael Solomon (11 Disemba 1886 - 26 Ọgọst 1920) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bishops (Diocesan College) na Rondebosch, Cape Town
Ọ lụrụ Jean Harkness (née Hamilton), onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na 1914
Ụmụ ha gụnyere Olga na nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Paul

O nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na mmepe ọdịbendị nke obodo ya ma bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka onye ntụgharị ya kachasị nwee nkà n'oge ndụ ya dị mkpirikpi. N'ihi nrụgide dị ukwuu nke e nyere ya ọrụ ịhazi ụlọ Mahadum Cape Town na Rondebosch na iweghachi ebe obibi Vergelegen n'otu oge ahụ, o gburu onwe ya na 1920 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na atọ.
